# IRules.CheckRule method

Rule classes must implemnt this interface. A rule may or may not write parameters values

```csharp
public bool CheckRule(StatesAgroMan st, IManagement m)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| st | states of the system, can be extended |
| m | management type |

## Return Value

true if rules are matched
